text: A mercenary contract has been issued on this army! Defeat them if you find the coin offered to be satisfactory!
Village Elders have requested the aid of hired "thugs" to protect them from a warmongering army! Slay the dogs. If you find the price agreeable!
A contract has been issued on this army, the reason why they will not disclose! The why doesn't matter to us though, only Coin.
We have been offered a commission from a merchant, his trade caravan is under constant attack and he wants it dealt with, the pay doesn't seem too bad either.
An Imperial Courier has delivered a request we defeat a most troublesome foe, let's hope the Empire understand we deal in Gold, not Glory!
